stocks.impact_theory: Supreme Court 6-3 ruling strikes down Trump's IEEPA tariffs, slashing import costs on Chinese goods critical to Amazon's supply chain. Economic boost via lower COGS, higher margins (est. 2-4% improvement), reduced inflation pass-through. Psychology: Relief from trade war overhang sparks FOMO buying. Parallels: 2019 Phase One deal (+3% AMZN). Analogies: 1. Lifting a tariff 'tax' like cutting grocery prices mid-inflation. 2. Freeing a clogged artery for cash flow surge.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: Web news highlights AMZN climb post-ruling; X sentiment overwhelmingly positive (e.g., tariff relief for e-com), latest posts show excitement. High engagement on trade-sensitive gains.

potential_profit_risks.long_position: Long positions eyeing +7-10% upside next 3-5 days on momentum.
potential_profit_risks.short_position: Avoid shorts; potential -6% whipsaw if Trump pivots to Section 232.
potential_profit_risks.key_risks: Admin backup tariffs, weak GDP data overshadowing, overbought technicals.

stocks.justification: Direct news tie-in, volume spike, consistent X/web bullishness; historical analogs strong.

stocks.impact_theory: Tariffs axed relieve pressure on China-assembled iPhones/iPads (70%+ supply chain), cutting costs ~$5-10/unit. Implications: Margin expansion, pricing power amid China tensions. Psych: Ends 'decoupling' fears, reignites buy cycle. Parallels: 2018 tariff truce rally (+5%). Analogies: 1. Cheaper fuel for a gas-guzzler jet. 2. Sun breaking through tariff fog for clear skies.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: X posts note AAPL advance; web confirms tech/trade-sensitive up post-SCOTUS. Sentiment shift from cautious to optimistic.

potential_profit_risks.long_position: Long for +5-8% as services growth compounds relief.
potential_profit_risks.key_risks: China retaliation risks, broader tech rotation out.

stocks.justification: AAPL heavy China exposure directly benefits; multi-source confirmation.

stocks.impact_theory: Apparel rally leader as Vietnam/China factories dodge tariffs, restoring ~3% margins eroded since 2025. Econ: Cheaper goods spur demand recovery. Psych: Short-covering frenzy. Parallels: Post-2019 deal NKE +4%. Analogies: 1. Tariff boots off a runner's feet. 2. Clearing import hurdles in a relay race.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: Seeking Alpha/web note apparel surge; X buzz on NKE rally. Strong sentiment pivot.

stocks.justification: Clear sector win, but NKE fundamentals mixed pre-news.

stocks.impact_theory: Shanghai Gigafactory parts/exports benefit from no retaliatory tariffs, easing EV cost pressures. Econ: Faster China expansion. Psych: Musk/Trump alignment softens blow. Parallels: 2020 tariff ease (+6% TSLA). Analogies: 1. Open border for battery imports. 2. Tailwind for a speeding Cybertruck.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: X mentions TSLA up; web auto sector gains. Positive but tempered by volatility.

stocks.justification: Indirect benefit, high beta amplifies move but noisy.

stocks.impact_theory: Auto parts imports cheaper sans tariffs, aiding F-150/Mach-E margins amid Mexico/China sourcing. Econ: Transport index jump signals sector relief. Psych: Rotation to cyclicals. Parallels: 2018 steel tariff lift (+2%). Analogies: 1. Lighter load for truck hauls. 2. Green light at trade border crossing.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: Web/Dow Transports up; X auto gains noted. Sentiment shift evident.

stocks.justification: Sector tailwind strong, company-specific risks moderate confidence.
